scripts.deploy:
npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const cwd=process.cwd();const root=path.resolve(cwd,'..');const docs=path.join(root,'docs');const v=Date.now();fs.rmSync(docs,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(docs,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(path.join(cwd,'dist'),docs,{recursive:true});let html=fs.readFileSync(path.join(docs,'index.html'),'utf8');html=html.replace('<head>','<head>
<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate">
<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache">
<meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0">');html=html.replace(new RegExp('(href=\"[^\"]+\\.css)(\")','g'),'$1?v='+v+'$2');html=html.replace(new RegExp('(src=\"[^\"]+\\.js)(\")','g'),'$1?v='+v+'$2');fs.writeFileSync(path.join(docs,'index.html'),html);fs.writeFileSync(path.join(docs,'CNAME'),'tkhtec.org');fs.copyFileSync(path.join(docs,'index.html'),path.join(docs,'404.html'));" && git -C .. add docs -A && git -C .. commit -m "Deploy" && git -C .. push
